description: This lightweight hoodie features our logo printed with a colorful striped motif and our signature Pony embroidered above the left cuff.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27.5" body length (front and back), a 19" shoulder, a 45.5" chest, and a 35" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes by 1" between sizes.
Drawstring hood with a ribbed V-inset.
"Polo Ralph Lauren" printed at the center front. Kangaroo pocket.
Signature embroidered Pony above the left cuff.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
